title: sa_śivopaniṣad
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
  <head>śivopaniṣad</head>

  <div type='adhyāya' n='1'>
  <lg xml:id='SU_1.1'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kailāsaśikharāsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśeṣāmarapūjitam</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālaghnaṃ śrīmahākālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvaraṃ jñānapāragam</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.1'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kailāsa-śikhara-āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśeṣa-amara-pūjitam</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāla-ghnaṃ śrī-mahākālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvaraṃ jñāna-pāragam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.2'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣyātreyaḥ susaṃyataḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvabhūtahitārthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>papracchedaṃ mahāmuniḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.2'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣy-ātreyaḥ susaṃyataḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-bhūta-hita-arthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>papraccha idaṃ mahā-muniḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.3'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñānayogaṃ na vindanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ye narā mandabuddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te mucyante kathaṃ ghorād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhagavan bhavasāgarāt</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.3'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāna-yogaṃ na vindanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ye narā manda-buddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te mucyante kathaṃ ghorād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhagavan bhava-sāgarāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.4'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prasannātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣy ātreyeṇa dhīmatā</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandabuddhivimuktyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālaḥ prabhāṣate</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.4'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prasanna-ātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣy ātreyeṇa dhīmatā</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-buddhi-vimukty-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-kālaḥ prabhāṣate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <milestone unit='speaker' n='mahādeva uvāca'/>
  <lg xml:id='SU_1.5'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purā rudreṇa gaditāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivadharmāḥ sanātanāḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāḥ sarvagaṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkṣepād granthakoṭibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.5'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purā rudreṇa gaditāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva-dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāḥ sarva-gaṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkṣepād grantha-koṭibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.6'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuḥ prajñāṃ tathā śaktiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasamīkṣya nṝṇām iha</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāpatrayaprapīḍāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhogatṛṣṇāvimohinīm</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.6'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuḥ prajñāṃ tathā śaktiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasamīkṣya nṝṇām iha</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāpa-traya-prapīḍāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhoga-tṛṣṇā-vimohinīm</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.7'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te dharmāḥ skandanandibhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyaiś ca munisattamaiḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāramādāya nirdiṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samyakprakaraṇāntaraiḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.7'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te dharmāḥ skanda-nandibhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyaiś ca muni-sattamaiḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāra-mādāya nirdiṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samyak-prakaraṇa-antaraiḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.8'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sārād api mahāsāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivopaniṣadaṃ param</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alpagranthaṃ mahārthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravakṣyāmi jagaddhitam</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.8'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sārād api mahā-sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva-upaniṣadaṃ param</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alpa-granthaṃ mahā-arthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravakṣyāmi jagad-dhitam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.9'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śivaḥ śiva ime śānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāma cādyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uccārayanti tad bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te śivā nātra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.9'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śivaḥ śiva ime śānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāma cā adyaṃ muhur-muhuḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uccārayanti tad bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te śivā na atra saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.10'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśivāḥ pāśasaṃyuktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśavaḥ sarvacetanāḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād vilakṣaṇās tebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād īśaḥ śivaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.10'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśivāḥ pāśa-saṃyuktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśavaḥ sarva-cetanāḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād vilakṣaṇās tebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād īśaḥ śivaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.11'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇo buddhir ahaṃkāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanmātrāṇīndriyāni ca</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtāni ca caturviṃśad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pāśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.11'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇo buddhir ahaṃkāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tan-mātrāṇi indriyāni ca</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtāni ca catur-viṃśad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pāśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.12'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcaviṃśakam ajñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahajaṃ sarvadehinām</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāśājālasya tan mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtiḥ kāraṇāya naḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.12'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcaviṃśakam ajñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahajaṃ sarva-dehinām</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāśā-jālasya tan mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtiḥ kāraṇāya naḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.13'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyajñāne nibadhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣāḥ pāśabandhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madbhāvāc ca vimucyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñāninaḥ pāśapañjarāt</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.13'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satya-jñāne nibadhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣāḥ pāśa-bandhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mad-bhāvāc ca vimucyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñāninaḥ pāśa-pañjarāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.14'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍviṃśakaś ca puruṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśur ajñaḥ śivāgame</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptaviṃśa iti proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivaḥ sarvajagatpatiḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.14'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍviṃśakaś ca puruṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśur ajñaḥ śiva-āgame</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptaviṃśa iti proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivaḥ sarva-jagat-patiḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.15'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmāc chivaḥ susaṃpūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvajñaḥ sarvagaḥ prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt sa pāśaharitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa viśuddhaḥ svabhāvataḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.15'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmāc chivaḥ susaṃpūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvajñaḥ sarvagaḥ prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt sa pāśa-haritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa viśuddhaḥ sva-bhāvataḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.16'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśupāśaparaḥ śāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paramajñānadeśikaḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śivaḥ śivāya bhūtānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ vijñāya vimucyate</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.16'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśu-pāśa-paraḥ śāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parama-jñāna-deśikaḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śivaḥ śivāya bhūtānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ vijñāya vimucyate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.17'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etad eva paraṃ jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva ity akṣaradvayam</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicārād yāti vistāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tailabindur ivāmbhasi</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.17'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etad eva paraṃ jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva ity akṣara-dvayam</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicārād yāti vistāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taila-bindur iva ambhasi</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.18'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakṛd uccāritaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva ity akṣaradvayam</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddhaḥ parikaras tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣopagamanaṃ prati</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.18'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakṛd uccāritaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva ity akṣara-dvayam</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddhaḥ parikaras tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣa-upagamanaṃ prati</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.19'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvyakṣaraḥ śivamantro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivopaniṣadi smṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekākṣaraḥ punaś cāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>om ity evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.19'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvy-akṣaraḥ śiva-mantro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiva-upaniṣadi smṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eka-akṣaraḥ punaś ca ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>om ity evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.20'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāmasaṃkīrtaṇād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivasyāśeṣapātakaiḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yataḥ pramucyate kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantro 'yaṃ dvyakṣaraḥ paraḥ</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.20'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāma-saṃkīrtaṇād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivasya aśeṣa-pātakaiḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yataḥ pramucyate kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantro 'yaṃ dvy-akṣaraḥ paraḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.21'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ śivaṃ śivam ity evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvyakṣaraṃ mantram abhyaset</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekākṣaraṃ vā satataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa yāti paramaṃ padam</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.21'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ śivaṃ śivam ity evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvy-akṣaraṃ mantram abhyaset</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eka-akṣaraṃ vā satataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa yāti paramaṃ padam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.22'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mitrasvajanabandhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryān nāma śivātmakam</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api tat kīrtanād yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpamuktaḥ śivaṃ puram</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.22'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mitra-svajana-bandhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuryān nāma śiva-ātmakam</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api tat kīrtanād yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpa-muktaḥ śivaṃ puram</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.23'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñeyaḥ sa śivaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naras tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste sadā nirudvignaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa dehānte vimucyate</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.23'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñeyaḥ sa śivaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naras tad-bhāva-bhāvitaḥ</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste sadā nirudvignaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa deha-ante vimucyate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.24'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛdy antaḥkaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivasya āyatanaṃ param</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛtpadmaṃ vedikā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>liṅgam oṃkāram iṣyate</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.24'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛdy antaḥ-karaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivasya āyatanaṃ param</seg> </l>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛt-padmaṃ vedikā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>liṅgam oṃ-kāram iṣyate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
  </note>

  <lg xml:id='SU_1.25'>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣaḥ sthāpako jñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ smṛtam</seg> </l>
	<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahiṃsā gomayaṃ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāntiś ca salilaṃ param</seg> //</l>
  </lg>
  <note type='analysis' corresp='#SU_1.25'>
	<lg>
	 <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣaḥ sthāpako jñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ smṛtam</seg> </l>
